text: Plowed is an EP by the Minneapolis-based noise rock band Cows, released in 1992 by Amphetamine Reptile Records. == Track listing == == Personnel == Adapted from the Plowed liner notes. ;Cows * Thor Eisentrager – guitar * Norm Rogers – drums * Kevin Rutmanis – bass guitar * Shannon Selberg – vocals, bugle ;Production and additional personnel * Adolphe Builha – engineering * Cows – production * David B. Livingstone – production ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format !
